faq-authentic-windows-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-1.message: Windows үчүн Psiphon эч качан бир орнотуу таңгагы катары таратылбайт. Ар бир Windows үчүн Psiphon кардары жалгыз аткаручу файлы катары берилет («.exe»), жана Psiphon Inc. тарабынан санарип колу бар болот. Windows кардарды жүргүзгөндө бул колду автоматтуу түрдө текшерет. Сиз бул колду өз алдынча текшерсеңиз болот, ал үчүн файлдын "Сапаттары" диалогун чакырып, "Санарип колдор" кыстармасын текшериңиз. Psiphon Inc. күбөлүгүнүн коомдук ачкычы үчүн SHA1 бармак издери "Күбөлүктүн диалог берилмелери" кыстармасында көрүнөт.
faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-authentic-windows-answer-para-2023.description: The Psiphon for Windows client can be authenticated by checking the certificate used to sign it has the correct thumbprint. The certificate is valid for a certain date range, and the thumbprint is shown below this sentence. 'SHA1' is the name of a hash algorithm, used to calculate the thumbprint (and is probably not translated).

faq-unsupported-platforms-question.message: МacOS, Linux, Windows Phone жана башкалары Psiphon-ду колдойбу?
faq-unsupported-platforms-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-unsupported-platforms-answer-para-1.message: Биз колдогон платформалар Түшүрмөлөр бетинде. Биз платформаларды колдообуздуа кеңейтүү максатында дайым иштеп келебиз, ошондуктан жакынкы келечекте сиздин каалаган платформаңызды колдоп калабыз деген үмүттөбүз!
faq-unsupported-platforms-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Is Psiphon available for OS X, Linux, iOS, Windows Phone, etc.?'

faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.message: “Sideloading” (капталдан жүктөө) дегенибиз - бул программаны түзмөккө Play Store аркылуу эмес орнотуу. Бул Play Store-до каттоосу жок адамдар үчүн, же болбосо аймакта колдонуу мүмкүн эмес болгондо пайдалануу үчүн арналган.
faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.description: Part of the answer to the FAQ question 'How do I enable Android “Sideloading”?'

faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.message: Android үчүн Psiphonду түздөн-түз түшүрүп алыш үчүн сиздин түзмөктө капталынан жүктөөнү иштетүүңүз керек. Андай кылуу үчүн Android баптоолоруңузга, андан кийин "Коопсуздук" бөлүмүнө барып,"Белгисиз булактар" дегенди күйгүзүңүз.
faq-android-enable-sideloading-answer-pa.description: Part of the answer to the FAQ question 'How do I enable Android “Sideloading”?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-android-enable-sideloading-image-alt.message: Screenshot of the Android security setting that allows installation of non-Play Store apps

faq-windows-xp-eol-question.message: Does Psiphon for Windows work on Windows XP or Vista?
faq-windows-xp-eol-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-xp-eol-answer-para-1.message: As of December 2019, Psiphon does not support Windows XP or Vista. A legacy build is available for download that will work on those platforms for the foreseeable future, but users are strongly encouraged to upgrade to a recent version of Windows.
faq-windows-xp-eol-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Does Psiphon for Windows work on Windows XP or Vista?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-information-collected-answer-redirec.message: Сураныч, биз кандай маалымат чогултканыбызды билиш үчүн биздин Купуялык Саясатыбызды карап чыгыңыз
faq-information-collected-answer-redirec.description: This is the FAQ answer to the question 'What info does Psiphon collect?' The user needs to go to a separate page to see the full answer.

faq-ip-change-question.message: Эмне үчүн менин Psiphon IP дарегим көп өзгөрөт?
faq-ip-change-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-ip-change-answer-para-1.message: Сиздин Psiphon кардарыңыз автоматтуу түрдө жаңы Psiphon серверлерин таба алат. Акыркы пайдаланылган сервер учурда мүмкүн эмес болсо, башка бирөө анын ордуна колдонулса болот.
faq-ip-change-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-connection-failed-question.message: Эмнеге "Туташуу ишке ашкан жок" деген билдирүү кайталанып келип жатат?

faq-connection-failed-answer-para-1.message: Сизде "байланыш ишке ашкан жок" билдирүүсү кайталанып жаткан болсо, анда кардар билген жеткиликтүү серверлер жок экендигин билдирет. Жаңы Psiphon кардарын түшүрүп алып көрүңүз.
faq-connection-failed-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-reset-system-proxy-question.message: Windows үчүн Psiphon-ду колдонгондон кийинкомпьютерим интернетке кирбей калды.
faq-reset-system-proxy-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-1.message: Windows үчүн Psiphon байланышканда, ал сиздин компьютериңиздин прокси калыптарын өзгөртөт, ал байланышты үзгөндө, аларды баштапкы түрүнө кайтарат. Эгерде Windows үчүн Psiphon өз жумушун туура аяктабаса, ал баштапкы прокси калыптарын туура абалына келтирбеши мүмкүн, ошондуктан сиз Интернетке байланыша албай калышыңыз мүмкүн.
faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After using Psiphon for Windows my computer can no longer connect to the Internet.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-2.message: Көйгөйдү чечүүнүн эң оңой жолу – Psiphon-го кайра байланышуу жана андан кийин байланышты таза үзүү.
faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After using Psiphon for Windows my computer can no longer connect to the Internet.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-3.message: Прокси калыптоолоруп кол менен түзөтүү үчүн, Internet Explorer-ди ачыңыз, андан соң Куралдар панелинде (же тиштүү дөңгөлөк сүрөтчөсү), Интернет Опциялары → Байланыштар бети → LAN калыптоо топчусун басыңыз. Сиздин LAN үчүн прокси серверди колдонуу белгилерин алып таштаңыз.
faq-reset-system-proxy-answer-para-3.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After using Psiphon for Windows my computer can no longer connect to the Internet.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-android-upgrade-bug-question.message: Android үчүн Psiphon-ду жаңылагандан кийин ал туташпайт.
faq-android-upgrade-bug-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-android-upgrade-bug-answer-para-1.message: Эгер жаңыланууну орнотуп жаткан кезде Psiphon байланышкан болсо, анда ал андан кийин байланыша албашы мүмкүн жана бул "start_tunnel_failed колдонмосу даяр эмес же кайра чыгарылган" катасын көрсөтөт. Бул Android ИС катасы үчүн болот. Бул катаны сиздин түзмөктү кайра иштетүү менен оңдосо болот.
faq-android-upgrade-bug-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'After upgrading the Psiphon for Android app, it won't connect.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-periodic-disconnect-question.message: Эмне үчүн Psiphon менен байланыш үзүлүп жатат?
faq-periodic-disconnect-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-periodic-disconnect-answer-para-1.message: Адатта бул түзмөгүңүздүн же компьютериңиздин туруксуз же начар интернет байланышынан болот. Телефондо бул сигналдын жоголуусун билдириши мүмкүн. Компьютерде ал начар Wi-Fi же болбосо ишенимсиз интернет кызматтарынын провайдерин көрсөтүүсү мүмкүн.
faq-periodic-disconnect-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why does my Psiphon connection sometimes disconnect?'

faq-ie6-docbody-question.message: Windows үчүн Psiphon “doc.body is null or not an object” (doc.body  бош же объект эмес) деген катаны чыгарып, иштебейт жатат .
faq-ie6-docbody-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-1.message: Бул ката Windows XP-де Internet Explorer 6 орнотулган болсо, чыгат. Windows үчүн Psiphon Internet Explorer 7 же андан жаңыраак нускасы орнотулуусун талап кылат. Internet Explorer-дин жаңы нускасын орнотуунун эң жакшы жолу – Windows Update.
faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-2.message: Эгерде сиз Windows Update кызматын колдоно албасаңыз жана Internet Explorer 7 же болбосо Internet Explorer 8ди түз орноткуңуз келсе, аларды бул шилтемелерден алсаңыз болот:
faq-ie6-docbody-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.'

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-xpie8.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.' This text is used as a link to a download.

faq-ie6-docbody-answer-xpie7.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Psiphon for Windows gives the error “doc.body is null or not an object” and does not work.' This text is used as a link to a download.

faq-check-version-question.message: Psiphon-дун азыркы версиясын кантип текшерүү керек?
faq-check-version-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-check-version-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon ишке киргенде, ал журнал чыгуусунун биринчи жолунда Клиенттин Нускасын көрсөтөт.
faq-check-version-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-get-updated-version-question.message: Psiphon-дун жаңыланган версиясын кантип алсам болот?
faq-get-updated-version-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-1.message: Android: Эгерде сиз Android үчүн Psiphon-ду Google Play Store аркылуу орноткон болсоңуз, жаңыртуу жеткиликтүү болгон кезде ал Play Store аркылуу автоматтуу түрдө жаңыланат. Эгерде сиз Android үчүн Psiphon-ду капталдан жүктөп алып орноткон болсоңуз, анда Psiphon клиенти жаңылануусу жеткиликтүү болгон кезде жүктөп алып, сизге жаңылатууну сураган билдирүү көрсөтүлөт.
faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I get an updated version of Psiphon?' for Android users. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-2.message: Windows: Windows үчүн Psiphon клиентижаңылануулар болсо, аларды түшүрүп алат жана орнотот.
faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I get an updated version of Psiphon?' for Windows users. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-3.message: Кол менен жаңылатуу:Эгерде Psiphon-дун өзүндөгү жаңылатуу механизми иштебесе (мисалы бөгөлгөн болсо), сиз Psiphon-дун жаңы нускасын кандай алуу керек экенин Түшүрүп алуу бетинен биле аласыз.
faq-get-updated-version-answer-para-3.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I get an updated version of Psiphon?' if the user believes that the automatic updating feature isn't working (or is blocked). 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-orig-file-purpose-question.description: Do no translate or transliterate the filename.

faq-orig-file-purpose-answer-para-1.message: Windows үчүн Psiphon-догу автоматтуу жаңыландыруу процеси анын эски нускасынын атын “psiphon3.exe.orig” кылып өзгөртөт. Атында “.orig” мүчөсү бар эски файлдарды коопсуз өчүрүүгө болот.
faq-orig-file-purpose-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-uninstall-windows-question.message: Windows үчүн Psiphon-ду кантип өчүрүүгө болот?
faq-uninstall-windows-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-uninstall-windows-answer-para-1.message: Windows үчүн Psiphon орнотулбайт, ошондуктан ал Windows-тун "Программаларды Кошуу же Өчүрүү" тизмегинде көрсөтүлбөйт. Орнтотула турган файлды сиздин "Түшүрмөлөр" папкаңызга же башка бир папкага көчүрүп, андан жүргүзүүгө болот. Эгер сиз программаларды өчүрүүнү кааласаңыз, ал орундалган файлды өчүрүү жетиштүү болот.
faq-uninstall-windows-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I uninstall Psiphon for Windows?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-clear-windows-data-question.message: How do I clear Psiphon for Windows' local data?
faq-clear-windows-data-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-clear-windows-data-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon for Windows stores some data locally under the user's profile. It is located at a path like C:\Users\YourName\AppData\Roaming\Psiphon3; or, more generally, %APPDATA%\Psiphon3. You can delete the local data by going to that path in Windows Explorer and deleting it, or entering this command at a command prompt: rmdir /s "%APPDATA%\Psiphon3".
faq-clear-windows-data-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I clear Psiphon for Windows' local data?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-proxy-all-question.message: Windows үчүн Psiphon колдонмом интернет трафигимин баарын проксиден өткөрөбү?
faq-proxy-all-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-proxy-all-answer-para-1.message: Бир гана VPN режиминде. Байланыш VPN режиминде туруктуу болгондон кийин компьютер трафигиңиз Psiphon тармагы аркылуу ишке ашат. VPN режими өчүп турганда, жергиликтүү HTTP жана SOCKS прокси серверлерин иштеткен колдонмолор гана проксиден өтөт.
faq-proxy-all-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-question.message: iOS үчүн Psiphon Браузери менин түзмөгүмдөгү интернет трафиктин баарын проксиден өткөрөбү?
faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon Browser for iOS is a browser-only application and so will only tunnel data that is loaded in the app itself, and will not tunnel your other apps (like your Facebook or Twitter apps) through the Psiphon network. So, for example, if you wanted to use the Psiphon network to access your Facebook account, you would use Psiphon Browser to go the Facebook website. If you were to open your Facebook app, it would use your direct internet connection, and would not be tunneled through the Psiphon network.
faq-proxy-all-ios-browser-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-browser-compatibility-question.message: Windows үчүн Psiphon Internet Explorer, Firefox жана Chrome веб браузерлери менен шайкеш келеби?
faq-browser-compatibility-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-browser-compatibility-answer-para-1.message: Ооба. Браузериңиздин баптоолорун карап, системанын прокси баптоолоруна дал келүүсүн текшериңиз.

faq-port-restrictions-question.description: FAQ question. Note that 'port' is referring to network ports. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-port-restrictions-answer-para-1.message: Outbound connections via the Psiphon network can only be made to a restricted set of server ports including: 53, 80, 443, 465, 587, 993, 995, 8000, 8001, 8080. See this discussion for more information. Mail clients cannot establish outbound connections on port 25. See this discussion for more information.
faq-port-restrictions-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Are there any port restrictions when using Psiphon?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-mail-apps-ports-question.message: Эмне үчүн Psiphon иштеп жатканда мага жаккан колдонмо иштебей жатат? Эмне үчүн почталык клиент аркылуу электрондук кат жөнөтүлбөй жатат?
faq-mail-apps-ports-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-mail-apps-ports-answer-para-1.message: Бул балким Psiphon-дун порт чектөөлөрүнүн айынан.
faq-mail-apps-ports-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I use my favorite app while Psiphon is running? Why can't I send email using my mail client?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-mobile-hotspot-question.message: Эмне үчүн Android мобилдик байланыш түйүнү жана USB-модем Psiphon аркылуу иштебей жатат?
faq-mobile-hotspot-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-mobile-hotspot-answer-para-1.message: Мунун себеби – Android-дин байланыш түйүнү жана байлоону (tethering) ишке ашыруусу. Сиз же байлоо түзмөгү интернетке кире албай, же трафик VPN  аркылуу жүрө албай турганын байкай аласыз.
faq-mobile-hotspot-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why do Android mobile hotspot and USB tethering not work through Psiphon?'

faq-av-firewall-question.message: Эмне себептен мендеги антивирус же фаэрвол Psiphon-ду коркунуч катары тааныйт?
faq-av-firewall-question.description: FAQ question. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-av-firewall-answer-para-1.message: Алгач сиздеги Psiphon нускасы накта экенин текшерүү керек. Сиздеги Psiphon нускасы накта экенин текшерүү үчүн бул нускамаларды аткарыңыз. Эгер ал накта эмес болсо, аны кайдан түшүргөндүгүңүздү жана, мүмкүн болсо, Psiphon аткаруу файлын тиркеп, бизге электрондук кат жибериңиз.
faq-av-firewall-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why does my antivirus or firewall identify Psiphon as a threat?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-av-firewall-answer-para-2.message: Эгер сиздеги Psiphon нускасы накта болсо, анда бул жалган оң эсептеме болот. Антивирус/фаэрвол программалардын көбү Psiphon-дун санарип колун өзүнүн уруксат берүү тизмесине кошсо да, айрымдары Psiphon-дун аткаруу файлын вирус же коркунучкатары аныктайт. Ошондой учурда, сиз колдонгон антивирус/фаэрвол программаны көрсөтүп, бизге электрондук кат жибериңиз, биз ал антивирус/фаэрволду сатуучу менен көйгөйдү чечүү максатында байланышабыз.
faq-av-firewall-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why does my antivirus or firewall identify Psiphon as a threat?' 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-metro-question.message: Менин Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) колдонмом эмне үчүн Psiphon аркылуу туннелденбей жатат?
faq-windows-metro-question.description: FAQ question. 'Metro' or 'Modern' is the fancy user interface that Microsoft introduced with Windows 8. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-metro-answer-para-1.message: Windows 8 ичинде Жумуш үстөл колдонмолоруна "Metro" деп аталган альтернатива киргизилген, кийин ал “Modern UI” деп кайра аталган. Кээбир өтө аз колдонмолор бир гана "Metro режиминде" гана жана кээбирлери (Internet Explorer сыяктуу) "Metro режиминде" жана "Жумуш үстөл режиминде" да жүргүзүлөт. Бул жаңы интерфейс режими Windows 8.1де жана, азыраак болсо да, Windows 10 ичинде да бар.
faq-windows-metro-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I tunnel my Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) apps through Psiphon?'

faq-windows-metro-answer-para-2.message: Колдонуучу системанын коопсуздук баптоолорун өзгөртпөсө, Metro режиминдеги колдонмолор жергиликтүү проксини колдоно албайт. Натыйжада Metro режиминдеги колдонмолор Psiphon-ду колдоно албайт жана Psiphon байланышкан кезде Интернетке чыга албайт. Metro режиминдеги колдонмолор Psiphon менен иштөөсү үчүн сиз EnableLoopback Utility колдоно аласыз.
faq-windows-metro-answer-para-2.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I tunnel my Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) apps through Psiphon?' 'EnableLoopback' should not be translated. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-metro-answer-para-3.message: Төмөнкү ката мисалдарын Metro режими колдонмолору Psiphon аркылуу иштебей жатканда көрүүгө болот.
faq-windows-metro-answer-para-3.description: FAQ answer to the question 'Why can't I tunnel my Windows Metro (aka Modern UI) apps through Psiphon?' This sentence is followed by two screenshots of error messages. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-protocol-question.message: Windows учүн Psiphon кандай VPN протоколун колдонот? Эмне үчүн туташылбай жатат?
faq-vpn-protocol-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-protocol-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-vpn-connect-question.message: Эмне үчүн мен Windows үчүн Psiphon-го L2TP/IPsec режиминде байланыша албай жатам?
faq-windows-vpn-connect-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-windows-vpn-connect-answer-para-1.message: Сиздин тармагыңыздын тармактык коргоосу VPN колдонууга тыйуу салуусу мүмкүн. Сиздин үй роутериңиз VPN протоколун өткөзүүгө калыптанбаган болушу мүмкүн; тармактык коргоо баптоолорунда IPsec же болбосо L2TPcheck өткөзүү уруксат берилгенин текшериңиз. Сиздин системаңыздын IPsec кызматтары өчүрүлгөн болушу мүмкүн; кызмат баптоолорун текшерип, алар автоматтык түрдө башталышына жол бериңиз.

faq-vpn-slow-question.message: Мен VPN режиминде Windows үчүн Psiphon-го туташа алам, бирок эмне үчүн ал абдан жай болуп жатат? Кээде веб беттер такыр жүктөлбөйт.
faq-vpn-slow-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-slow-answer-para-1.message: Кээ бир тармактык аппараттар же интернет байланыштары, Psiphon-дун VPN режиминде колдонгон L2TP/IPsec протоколу үчүн майнаптуулук көйгөйлөрүн жаратуусу мүмкүн. VPN режимин өчүрүп көрүңүз.
faq-vpn-slow-answer-para-1.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-dns-question.message: VPN режиминде Windows үчүн Psiphon-го туташууда веб беттер жүктөлбөй жатат. Домен издөөсү ишке ашпады деген билдирүү келип жатат.
faq-vpn-dns-question.description: 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

faq-vpn-dns-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon DNS трафикти уруксат берилген DNS серверлери менен чектейт. Psiphon кардары сиздин VPN DNS сервер баптоолорун автоматтуу түрдө баптайт. DNS менен байланышкан каталар орун алса, "DNS Changer" аттуу вирустарга кабылбагандыгыңызды текшериңиз, алар сиздин DNS сервердин баптоолорун алмаштырууга аракет жасайт. Толук маалыматты бул жерден алсаңыз болот.

faq-configure-applications-question.message: Psiphon туннелдөөнү колдонуу үчүн колдонмолорду кантип конфигурациялаш керек?

faq-configure-applications-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon сиздин системаңызды автоматтуу түрдө локалдык прокси HTTP/HTTPS прокси жана локалдык SOCKS прокси сервер урунууга конфигурациялайт. Бул проксилер үчүн порт номерлери Psiphon баптоолорунда көрсөтүлбөсө, кокустан туш келгени тандалат. Системдин прокси баптоолорун колдонгон Windows колдонмолор автоматтык түрдө проксиленет. Башка колдонмолорду бул локалдык проксилерди урунууга кол менен конфигурацияласаңыз болот. Windows үчүн Psiphon да, Android үчүн Psiphon да бул локалдык проксилерди колдонот.

faq-ssh-plus-question.message: Psiphon туннели кайсы протоколду демейки колдонот?

faq-ssh-plus-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon протоколдордун манжа изин аныктоодон коргоо үчүн SSH кол алышуу үстүнөн обфускация кабаты кошулган SSH колдонот. Протоколдун сыпаттамасын бул жерден тапса болот.

faq-autoproxy-question.message: How can I tell Psiphon for Windows not to configure my system proxy settings?

faq-autoproxy-question-toc.message: How can I tell Psiphon for Windows not to configure my system proxy settings?

faq-autoproxy-answer-para-1.message: Реестрдин Редакторун ачуу үчүн Жүргузүүнү басып, regedit сөзүн териңиз. 2HKEY_CURRENT_USER Software\Psiphon3 таап, ачсаңыз, оң жакта SkipProxySettings дегенди көрөсүз. Бул маанини 1 кылып койсоңуз, Psiphon автоматтуу түрдө системалык прокси баптоолорун конфигурациялабайт.

faq-screen-filter-question.message: Эмне үчүн Android үчүн Psiphon биринчи жолу байланышканда, мен эмнеге "Бул колдонмого ишенем" дегенди тандай албайм?

faq-screen-filter-answer-para-1.message: Сизде экранды чыпкалоо же болбосо жарыктыгын башкара турган колдонмо жүргүзүлбөгөнүн текшериңиз. Эгер алар бар болсо, аларды өчүрүп көрүңүз. Ошондой колдонмолордун көбү (Lux Auto Brightness, Twilight, Night Mode сыяктуу) колдонуучуларга бул суроо менен өз ара аракеттенүүсүнө жол бербейт.
faq-screen-filter-answer-para-1.description: FAQ answer to 'What protocol does the default Psiphon tunnel use?'.

faq-isp-traffic-question-toc.message: Psiphon-ду иштетип жатканымда, интернетте эмне кылып жатканымды интернет провайдерим көрө алабы?

faq-isp-traffic-question.message: Psiphon-ду иштетип жатканымда, интернетте эмне кылып жатканымды интернет провайдерим көрө алабы?

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-1.message: All data that goes through Psiphon is encrypted. This means that your ISP cannot see the content of your Internet traffic: web pages you browse, your chat messages, your uploads, etc.

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-2.message: Ошентсе да, Psiphon интернет цензурасын аттап өтүү үчүн курал катары жасалган жана көзөмөлдөөгө каршы атайын курал катары жасалган эмес. Psiphon браузериңиздин тарыхы жана күкүм файлдары компьютериңизде сакталуусун алдын албайт. Жана кээбир режимдерде жана калыптарда - мисалы, эгерде сиздин браузериңиздин калыптары ката болсо, же болбосо сиз Psiphon жумушун аяктагандан кийин браузериңизди ачык калтырсаңыз, сиздин интернет трафигиңиз Psiphon аркылуу туннелдөөдөн өтпөй калуусу мүмкүн.

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-3.message: Ошондой эле, шифрленген трафикти көрө алган жана бул тууралуу кээ бир нерселерди, мисалы, кайсы вебсайт каралып жатканын, аныктай алган өркүндөтүлгөн техникалар да бар. Биринчи мисал - Бармак издерин аныктоо.

faq-isp-traffic-answer-para-4.message: Эгер сиз анонимдүүлүктү сактагыңыз келсе, анда Psiphon-дун ордуна Tor-ду колдонушуңуз керек.

faq-vulnerability-report-question.message: How do I report a security vulnerability?

faq-vulnerability-report-answer.message: Please see our security.txt file for contact information and details.
faq-vulnerability-report-answer.description: FAQ answer to the question 'How do I report a security vulnerability?'.

faq-root-wdm-question.message: Root режиминдеги Android түзмөктөрүндө бүткүл түзмөккө эмне болду?
faq-root-wdm-question.description: This is a FAQ question. Previously, users with old Android devices could still tunnel the whole device if the device was rooted. This functionality was removed in December of 2015. This question/answer tells them about that and what they can do.

faq-root-wdm-question-toc.message: Root режиминдеги Android түзмөктөрүндө бүткүл түзмөккө эмне болду?
faq-root-wdm-question-toc.description: This is a FAQ question. Previously, users with old Android devices could still tunnel the whole device if the device was rooted. This functionality was removed in December of 2015. This question/answer tells them about that and what they can do.

faq-root-wdm-answer-para-1.message: 2015-жылдын декабрына чейин Android үчүн Psiphon-до Android нускасы эски болгон (-4.0/ICS чейинки) түзмөк ээлерине бүткүл түзмөктү, ал тамырланган болсо, туннелдөөгө мүмкүндүк берген өзгөчөлүк бар болчу. Ал учурдагы Psiphon-го негизги жаңыртуу ал өзгөчөлүкту алып салууну зарыл кылган.
faq-root-wdm-answer-para-1.description: This is the first paragraph of a FAQ answer. Previously, users with old Android devices (before Android version 4.0, also known as Ice Cream Sandwich) could still tunnel the whole device if the device was rooted. This functionality was removed in December of 2015. This question/answer tells them about that and what they can do.

faq-refund-question.message: How do I get a refund for a subscription, purchase of PsiCash, or other purchase?
faq-refund-question.description: This is an FAQ question. This is for refunds made with money to purchase subscriptions, PsiCash, etc. 'Puchase of PsiCash' means buying PsiCash credit with real money. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-refund-answer-para-1.message: Android: If it has been less than 48 hours since you made the purchase, you can get a refund through the Play Store. After 48 hours, email us at refund+android@psiphon.ca. Please include your name, the email address of your Play Store account, the date of the purchase, what was purchased, the amount of the purchase, and the reason you are requesting the refund.
faq-refund-answer-para-1.description: This is the first paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-refund-answer-para-2.message: iOS and macOS: Please request the refund through the App Store.
faq-refund-answer-para-2.description: This is the second paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-refund-answer-para-3.message: Windows: Email us at refund+windows@psiphon.ca. Please include your name, the email address or phone number used at the time of purchase, the date of the purchase, what was purchased, the amount of the purchase, and the reason you are requesting the refund.
faq-refund-answer-para-3.description: This is the third paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-refund-answer-para-4.message: Note that refunds may take up to a week to process.
faq-refund-answer-para-4.description: This is the fourth paragraph of an FAQ answer.

faq-psicash-create-account-question.message: Why should I create a PsiCash account?
faq-psicash-create-account-question.description: This is an FAQ question. It discusses the benefits of creating a PsiCash account. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated..

faq-psicash-create-account-answer-para-1.message:
With an account, your PsiCash balance is kept safe and can be shared between your devices. If you don't have a PsiCash account, your balance is specific to each device, and losing a device means losing your balance on that device. When you have an account, all you need to do is log in to restore your balance.

We will also be adding more benefits to having a PsiCash account in the future, such as transferring PsiCash between users and offering purchases that apply to all of your devices.
faq-psicash-create-account-answer-para-1.description: This is an FAQ answer. It discusses the benefits of creating a PsiCash account. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psicash-pseudonym-question.message: Why should I use a pseudonym or alias for my PsiCash account username?
faq-psicash-pseudonym-question.description: This is an FAQ question. It discusses why a user might want to employ a pseudonym for their PsiCash account username. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated..

faq-psicash-pseudonym-answer-para-1.message:
A pseudonym is an alias or handle that you use to identify yourself that is different from your real name. Using a pseudonym for your PsiCash account username helps prevent your real identity from being linked with your Psiphon or PsiCash usage. If revealing yourself to be a Psiphon user is dangerous or otherwise undesirable, then you should choose a username that cannot be linked to you, and instead you should use a pseudonym that you have not used with any other site or service.

When signing up for a new PsiCash account, it is possible for someone to check for the existence of a username by trying to create an account with it. If the attempt is successful, the username did not already exist. If the attempt failed, the username did already exist. Having your username discovered does not put your PsiCash account at risk, but your status as a Psiphon user may be revealed in this way.

If you wish to avoid the link to your real identity, it is important to note that using a pseudonym that you use on other sites or services is almost the same as using your real name. If that pseudonym has already been linked to your identity elsewhere, then very little anonymity is gained by using it.

Also note that your email address is not discoverable in this way. Even if you use a pseudonym, you can still provide an email address on your PsiCash account and it will not be discoverable in any way.
faq-psicash-pseudonym-answer-para-1.description: This is an FAQ answer. It discusses why a user might want to employ a pseudonym for their PsiCash account username. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psicash-more-account-merges-question.message: What if I need to merge the PsiCash balance from more devices into my account?
faq-psicash-more-account-merges-question.description: This is an FAQ question. It discusses what a user should do if they need to merge more PsiCash into an account. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated..

faq-psicash-more-account-merges-answer-p.message: To avoid abuse, we allow the pre-existing PsiCash balance and Speed Boost to be added from only a few devices to your PsiCash account when logging in. If you have more devices that you would like to keep the balances from, please email us at psicash.support@psiphon.ca. You must include your PsiCash username and the reason why you need more merges.
faq-psicash-more-account-merges-answer-p.description: This is an FAQ answer. It discusses what a user should do if they need to merge more PsiCash into an account. Note that the actual number for 'a few devices' is currently 3. 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psicash-param-question.message: What is the psicash= parameter in some landing page URLs?
faq-psicash-param-question.description: This is an FAQ question. It explains what the 'psicash=' parameter in URLs is for (and that it doesn't expose or reveal anything). 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated..

faq-psicash-param-answer-para-1.message: In some landing page URLs and in buy.psi.cash URLs you will see a parameter like #!psicash=abcd1234... or ?psicash=abcd1234.... This contains information necessary to give you a PsiCash reward for visiting some landing pages or for making a purchase of PsiCash.
faq-psicash-param-answer-para-1.description: This is an FAQ answer. It explains what the 'psicash=' parameter in URLs is for (and that it doesn't expose or reveal anything) 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

faq-psicash-param-answer-para-2.message: The "token" you will see in the decoded base-64 of the parameter is your PsiCash "earner" token, and can only be used for crediting your account with PsiCash -- not for spending your PsiCash, viewing your balance, etc. This token also cannot be used to reveal your identity or anything else about your account.
faq-psicash-param-answer-para-2.description: This is an FAQ answer. It explains what the 'psicash=' parameter in URLs is for (and that it doesn't expose or reveal anything) 'PsiCash' should not be translated or transliterated.

about-who-we-are-para-1.message: Psiphon Inc. жума сайын 3 миллиондон ашуун кишиге Интернет мазмунуна байланышууга жардам берген ачык булактуу көп платформаалуу жумшак жабдык өндүргөн, Торонтодо жайгашкан компания болуп саналат. Биз туруктуу өнүгүп келе жаткан глобалдык аудиториянын талаптарына жараша туруктуу жаңы продукттарды иштеп чыккан, эң жакшы жумшак жабдууну тартуулоого багытталган жамаатпыз.

about-who-we-are-exec-team-para-1.message: Майкл Хулл –Psiphon Inc. төрагасы, ал Psiphon менен эң башынан бери, Торонто Университетинин Citizen Lab долбооу катары башталганда бери болду. Андан бери жумшак жабдыкты иштеп чыгууну жетектеп, Psiphon инновацияларды колдонуп оюндун туу чокусунда болуусуна салым кошуп келет.

about-who-we-are-software-development-pa.message: Psiphon-до биз колдонуучуларыбыз жакшы тажрыйбага ээ болушуна умтулабыз. Бул биздин жумшак жабдык колдонуу үчүн жеңил болушу керек, биздин тармак тез болушу керек, ал экөө тең таштан бекем, туруктуу болушу керек дегенди билдирет. Буга жетишүү ар кандай иштеп чыгычулар үчүн оор, өзгөчө жумшак жабдык дайыма өзгөрүп туруучу атаандаштык чөйрөдө көп тилдерде жана аянтчаларда иштеши керек болгондо абдан кыйын болот.

Биз ошондой эле, көшөгөнүн артында биздин колдонуучулар үчүн күч-аракет жумшоо да маанилүү экенин билебиз. Биз кардарларыбызды жана жеке берилмелерин максималдуу түрдө коргойбуз. Колдонуучулар алардын купуялыгын жана коопсуздугун камсыз кылуу боюнча чараларды байкабай калышы мүмкүн , бирок биз баалашын билебиз.

Psiphon жумшак жабдыгын иштеп чыгуу тобу мыкты, тез, жөнөкөй жана абдан ачык айланып өтүү жолдорун жеткирүү үчүн аракет кылат. Биз ошондой эле, биздин тажрыйбабыз дүйнө жүзү боюнча колдонуучулардын кызыкчылыктарын коргоо, мүмкүнчүлүктөрүн кеңейтүү жана бошотуу жолдорун издейбиз.

about-who-we-are-ops-para-1.message: Айрым өлкөлөрдө иш алып барган масштабдуу эл аралык компаниялардан баштап чакан укук коргоочу уюмдарга чейин бир катар келишимдерибиз бар. Биздин Операциялар жана Жайылтуу жамаат, аларга өз таратуу ыкмалары аркылуу Psiphon-го канча колдонуучу кирип жаткандыгы тууралуу баяндамаларды жасайт. Ошондой эле, алар интернеттеги мааалымат агымына таасир этүүчү болочоктогу иш-чараларды жана тенденцияларды изилдеп чыгышат.

about-who-we-are-partners-para-1.message: Psiphon works closely with various groups to provide support and advice to people using Psiphon wherever they are. We have translations for our software in dozens of languages, and are adding more to our products through Transifex, with the help of the Localization Lab.

privacy-para-1.message: Psiphon өзүнүн кардарларынын, аяккы колдонуучуларынын, дистрибьютерлеринин купуялык кызыкчылыктарын сактоого умтулат. Бул купуялык саясаты сиздин жеке маалыматты кандайча пайдаланылышы мүмкүн экендиги жөнүндө жалпы маалымат менен камсыз кылуу үчүн арналган. Psiphon – башкы кеңсеси Онтариодо жайгашкан, Канадалык юридикалык жак жана биздин купуялык саясатыбыз Канада жана Онтарио купуялык мыйзамдарын жана көрсөтмөлөрүн чагылдырган негизде иштелип чыккан.

privacy-para-2.message: Канада жана Онтарио мыйзамдарына байланыштуу көбүрөөк маалымат алуу үчүн төмөнкү сайтка кириңиз:

privacy-canadian-privacy-commission-link.message: Канада Купуялык Саясаты боюнча Ыйгарым Укуктуу Комиссарынын Офиси

privacy-updates-head.description: Heading for a section in our privacy policy. The section description how we handle updates to the policy.

privacy-bulletin-info-para-1.message: From time to time, Psiphon will add entries to our Privacy Bulletin. This will happen for two reasons:

privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-1.message: We modify the Privacy Policy. This can happen when new laws add different requirements, or if we start or stop using a third-party service. We will detail the changes made to the policy.
privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-1.description: A bullet list item following from 'This will happen for two reasons:'

privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-2.message: We temporarily deviate from our Privacy Policy by changing our information collection behaviour. This is typically done to resolve a problem with our service, or to give us more time to analyze our data relating to an interesting censorship event. We will describe the change, for example what was recorded, how long it was kept, and why.
privacy-bulletin-info-para-2-item-2.description: A bullet list item following from 'This will happen for two reasons:'

faq-information-collected-question.description: Heading for a section in our privacy policy.

privacy-information-collected-data-categ.description: Heading for a section in our privacy policy. Under this heading will be sections with the different categories of data covered by the privacy policy.

privacy-information-collected-client-ads.description: Sub-heading on the Privacy Policy page above the info about what data categories are collected by the ads shown in the Psiphon client software

privacy-information-collected-client-adv.message: Кээбирде биз өз кызматыбызды колдоо үчүн жарнамаларды колдонобуз, ал болсо, күкүмдөр жана веб аныктагыч сыяктуу технологияларды колдонуусу мүмкүн. Биздин жарнамалык шериктештерибиздин күкүмдөрдү колдонуусу алар жана алардын шериктештерине сиздин колдонуу маалыматыңызга негизделип, жарнаманы көрсөтүүнү мүмкүн кылган. Бул жол аркылуу жыйналган баардык маалымат биздин жарнамалык шериктештерибиздин жекелик саясаттарына шайкеш иштетилет:
Сиз бул жерде кызыкчылыкка негизделген кулактандыруу үчүн күкүмдөрдү пайдалануудан баш тарта аласыз:

privacy-information-collected-websites-h.description: Sub-heading on the Privacy Policy page above the info about what data categories are collected by the Psiphon websites

privacy-information-collected-websites-g.description: Sub-heading for section describing use of Google Analytics and what info they collect

privacy-information-collected-websites-g.message: Колдонуу тууралуу маалымат чогултуу үчүн биз кээ бир сайттарга Google Аналитикасын колдонобуз. Google Аналитика тарабынан чогултулган маалымат, ушул сайттагы аралоо жүрүм-турумуңузга байланыштуу статистикалык анализ үчүн гана иштетилет. Google аналитикадан алынган маалымат сиздин жекелигиңизди аныктабайт жана ким экениңизди аныктоочу маалымат түзүү үчүн башка булактардан алынган маалымат менен кошулбайт.

Google Analytics sets a permanent cookie in your web browser to identify you as a unique user the next time you visit the site, but this cookie cannot be used by anyone except Google, and the data collected cannot be altered or retrieved by services from other domains.

Google-дун Google Analytics кызматы менен чогултулган сиздин бул сайтка кирүүлөрүңүз тууралуу маалыматын иштетүү жана бөлүшүү мүмкүнчүлүгү Google Analytics Колдонуу Шарттары жана Google Купуялык Саясаты менен чектелген. Бул үчүн сиз браузериңиздин баптоолорунан күкүмдөрдү өчүрүү аркылуу андан баш тарта аласыз.

privacy-information-collected-s3-logging.description: Sub-heading for section describing use of logging access to data storage (aka S3 bucket logging). The way to read this is 'creation of logs for user accesses to data storage'. Psiphon 'stores' websites, downloads, and upgrades (the 'data') in Amazon S3 (the 'storage'). Users 'access' the data storage. And, somtimes, we 'log' those accesses. (For example, if we suspect attackers are accessing the storage, or if it seems the storage is blocked by a country.)

privacy-information-collected-s3-logging.message: Биз Amazon S3-тү сайттын файлдарын жана Psiphon серверлерин табуу тизмелери сыяктуу файлдарды сактоо үчүн колдонобуз. Кээбирде биз бул файлдардын жүктөөсүн журналдоосун ишке кошобуз. Бул журналдарды талдоо бизге "канча колдонуучулар серверлер табуу тизмесин жүктөөнү баштап, бирок акырына чыкпаган?", "жүктөлгөн маалымат вебсайт курамасы жана серверлерди табуу тизмеси арасында кандай бөлүнөт?" жана "чабуулчу биздин вебсайттарыбызга каршы кызматтан баш тартуу талабын жасап жатабы?" сыяктуу суроолорго жооп табууга көмөк көрсөтөт.

S3 bucket каттануу журналдарынын ичинде IP даректер, колдонуучу агенттер жана убакыт белгилери сакталат. Бул журналдар S3-түн өзүндө сакталат, ошондуктан бул журналдар Amazon үчүн жеткиликтүү. (Ошентсе да Amazon бул файлдарды тейлейт, ошондуктан бул маалымат аларга мурунтан эле жеткиликтүү.) Psiphon-дун өндүрүүчүлөрү бул журналдарды жүктөп алышат, маалыматты топтоп жана анализдешет, андан соң журналдарды өчүрүшөт. Чийки маалымат өндүрүлгөнгө чейин гана кармалат жана үчүнчү жактарга берилбейт.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-1.message: Psiphon runs many servers for many reasons. On those servers we collect the following data to monitor the health of the Psiphon system. It helps us to learn things like how well Psiphon is working, what propagation strategies are effective, and how users are obtaining the Psiphon client.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-2-.message: Number of email requests to our automated responder
Канча жолу ар бир протокол колдонулат жана ийгиликсиз өткөндөн кийин ката коддору
Жаңы серверлер канча убакта бир ачылып турат?
Amount of data transferred through the Psiphon system
Client platform (simplified operating system list; not a detailed browser user agent)

faq-information-collected-answer-para-3b.message: Колдонуучунун IP даректери Psiphon серверлери менен иштин кадимки жүрүшүндө топтолбойт. Psiphon колдонуучунун катталуусун мажбурлабайт, ошондуктан, демейки эч кандай электрондук даректерди, колдонуучу аттарын же сырсөздөрдү талап кылбайт.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-4.message: Event logs include timestamps, region codes (country and city), and non-identifying attributes including sponsor ID (determined by which Psiphon client build is used), client version, and protocol type.

faq-information-collected-answer-para-5.message: Any statistics shared with third parties are aggregated by date, sponsor, and region, to a sufficient coarseness that they are non-identifying.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-he.description: Sub-heading on the Privacy Policy page for the section describing handling of user traffic data and activity statistics through the Psiphon VPN

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Why should you care?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes why it's important for users to consider what a VPN does with their traffic data.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: When using a VPN or proxy you should be concerned about what the VPN provider can see in your data, collect from it, and do to it.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Why should you care?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: When you use a VPN, all data to and from your device goes through it. If you visit a website that uses unencrypted HTTP, all of that site's data is visible to the VPN. If you visit a website that uses encrypted HTTPS, the site content is encrypted, but some information about the site might be visible to the VPN. Other apps and services on your device will also transfer data that is encrypted or unencrypted. (Note that this is distinct from the encryption that all VPNs provide. Here we're only concerned with data that is or is not encrypted inside the VPN tunnel.)
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Why should you care?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page. '<em>' is an 'emphasis' (like italics) HTML tag, which can be used if it makes sense in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: For unencrypted services, it is possible for a VPN provider to see, collect, and modify (e.g., injecting ads into) the contents of your data. For encrypted data, it is still possible for a VPN to collect metadata about sites visited or actions taken. You should also be concerned with your VPN provider sharing your data with third parties.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Why should you care?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes what undesirable things Psiphon DOES NOT do with user data. '<strong>' is an HTML tag that makes text bold, which can be used if it makes sense in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: We DO NOT collect or store any VPN data that is not mentioned here.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: We DO NOT modify the contents of your VPN data.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: We DO NOT share any sensitive or user-specific data with third parties.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon NOT do with your data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.message: What kinds of user data does Psiphon collect?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.message: We will define some categories of data to help us talk about them in the context of Psiphon.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ki.description: Paragraph text in the 'What kinds of user data does Psiphon collect?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Sub-heading for the definition of 'User Activity Data' under the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: While a user's device is tunneled through Psiphon, we collect some information about how they're using it. We record what protocol Psiphon used to connect, how long the device was connected, how many bytes were transferred during the session, and what city, country, and ISP the connection came from. For some domains (but very few, and only popular ones) or server IP addresses (e.g., known malware servers) that are visited, we also record how many bytes were transferred to it. (But never full URLs or anything more sensitive. And only domains of general interest, not all domains.)
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: Geographical location and ISP info are derived from user IP addresses, which are then immediately discarded.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: An example of user activity data might be: At a certain time a user connected from New York City, using Comcast, and transferred 100MB from youtube.com and 300MB in total.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.message: We consider user activity data the most sensitive category of data. We never, ever share this data with third parties. We keep user activity data for at most 90 days, and then we aggregate it and delete it. Backups of that data are kept for a reasonable amount of time.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-us.description: Paragraph text in the 'User Activity Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Sub-heading for the definition of 'Aggregated Data' under the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.message: Data is “aggregated” by taking a lot of sensitive user activity data and combining it together to form coarse statistical data that is no longer specific to a user. After aggregation, the user activity data is deleted.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Paragraph text in the 'Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.message: An example of aggregated data might be: On a particular day, 250 people connected from New York City using Comcast, and transferred 200GB from youtube.com and 500GB in total.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Paragraph text in the 'Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.message: Aggregated data is much less sensitive than activity data, but we still treat it as potentially sensitive and do not share it in this form.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-ag.description: Paragraph text in the 'Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Sub-heading for the definition of 'Shareable Aggregated Data' under the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: When sharing aggregated data with third parties, we make sure that the data could not be combined with other sources to reveal user identities. For example, we do not share data for countries that only have a few Psiphon users in a day. We make sure that the data is anonymized.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.message: We also never share domain-related information with third parties.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-sh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Shareable Aggregated Data' definition subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes what Psiphon does with the little bit of VPN data that it collects stats from.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Activity and aggregated statistical data are vital for us to make Psiphon work best. It allows us to do things like:
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Monitor the health and success of the Psiphon network: We need to know how many people are connecting, from where, how much data they're transferring, and if they're having any problems.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Monitor threats to our users' devices: We watch for malware infections that attempt to contact command-and-control servers.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Ensure users stay connected while foiling censors: We try to detect that a user is behaving like a real person and then reveal new Psiphon servers to them. (This is our obfuscated server list technology.)
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Estimate future costs: The huge amount of user data we transfer each month is a major factor in our costs. It is vital for us to see and understand usage fluctuations.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Determine the nature of major censorship events: Sites and services often get blocked suddenly and without warning, which can lead to huge variations in regional usage of Psiphon. For example, we had up to 20x surges in usage within a day when Brazil blocked WhatsApp or Turkey blocked social media.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Understand who we need to help: Some sites and services will never get blocked anywhere, some will always be blocked in certain countries, and some will occasionally be blocked in some countries. To make sure that our users are able to communicate and learn freely, we need to understand these patterns, see who is affected, and work with partners to make sure their services work best with Psiphon.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'What does Psiphon do with User Activity and Aggregated Data?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Sub-heading in the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy Policy page. The section describes who Psiphon shares VPN data stats. The answer will be organizations and not specific people, in case that makes a difference in your language.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Shareable aggregated data is shared with sponsors, organizations we collaborate with, and civil society researchers. The data can be used to show such things as:
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Who does Psiphon share these statistics with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: How well Psiphon is working in a particular region.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: The blocking patterns in a given country, for example during political events.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: That the populace of a country is determined to access the open internet.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Bullet list text under 'Who does Psiphon share Aggregated Data with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.message: Again, only anonymized shareable aggregated data is ever shared with third parties.
privacy-information-collected-vpndata-wh.description: Paragraph text in the 'Who does Psiphon share these statistics with?' subsection of the 'User Activity and VPN Data' section of the Privacy page.

privacy-information-collected-mypsicash-.message: my.psi.cash uses Google’s reCAPTCHA v3 (hereinafter “reCAPTCHA”), which protects websites from spam and abuse by non-human users (i.e., bots). reCAPTCHA collects personal information that is required for the functioning of the technology and is subject to its own privacy policy. Use of my.psi.cash indicates acceptance of Google’s Privacy Policy and Terms.

privacy-information-collected-mypsicash-.message: Our use of reCAPTCHA is strictly limited to ensuring the continued functioning of my.psi.cash. reCAPTCHA technology performs an automatic analysis for each site request without requiring the user to take any additional actions. The data collected during analysis is forwarded to Google, where Google will use this data to determine if you are a human user. psiphon-guide-para-1.message: Psiphon Inc. has provided open access to the Internet for millions of citizens around the world since 2006. Psiphon operates a proxy system known as “Psiphon 2” as well as “Psiphon 3,” which is an application (“app”) for Android, Windows, and iOS. The following documents focus on the Psiphon 3 network, which is the most widely used. Psiphon is a free, open-source, censorship circumvention software. It uses a combination of secure communication and obfuscation technologies to allow users to connect with apps and content which would otherwise be blocked.
psiphon-guide-para-1.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. A general description of how Psiphon works, and what Psiphon is. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-splash-image-alt.description: splash image for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-section-1-sub-heading-the-.description: Sub-heading of Section 1 for the Psiphon Guide page

psiphon-guide-para-2.message: The internet is a global network of billions of computers (or “routers”) which communicate with one another. These connected systems allow people to share (or “serve”) information to others. The internet can be visualized as a web, with multiple routes and connections. If one connection is severed, the redundancy of the web infrastructure allows people to connect by finding another route. To get from one location to another, web traffic (messages sent on the internet) make many hops. Traffic travels from router to router before arriving at their destination. In order to do this, specific networking and routing equipment is required. This is provided by Internet Service Providers (“ISPs”). ISPs allow internet users to use their infrastructure, including "serving" content or providing access to other content that other ISPs "serve", usually for a fee.
psiphon-guide-para-2.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. A general description of the internet.

psiphon-guide-section-1-sub-heading-filt.description: Sub-heading of Section 1 for the Psiphon Guide page

psiphon-guide-para-3.message: Filtering can occur at one or many points in the network, such as, the internet backbone (often the international gateway), ISPs, institutions (such as companies or schools), and even on an individual's device (such as a phone or desktop computer).
psiphon-guide-para-3.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page.

psiphon-guide-para-4.message: Censors are actors implementing filtering at any level. They could be implementing filtering on behalf of another body, such as when an ISP filters content under orders of a government.
psiphon-guide-para-4.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page.

psiphon-guide-para-5.message: In order to block only certain types of traffic, the traffic must first be identifiable. When a system can differentiate between types of traffic passing through the network, it is potentially able to make decisions about that traffic. Filtering can be done through devices and programs that analyze and forbid certain types of traffic to pass. In some places technical blocking affects everyday Internet use.
psiphon-guide-para-5.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. A description of both filtering and blocking of internet traffic.

psiphon-guide-section-1-sub-heading-circ.description: Sub-heading of Section 1 for the Psiphon Guide page.

psiphon-guide-para-6.message: Psiphon is part of a category of technology known as circumvention tools. Circumvention tools are designed to bypass interceptive technical forms of blocking online. Circumvention tools usually work by either diverting web traffic so it avoids the machines that filter or by disguising the traffic to appear like traffic that is not subject to filtering. The Psiphon app does both. As filtering techniques become more sophisticated, circumvention tool providers must always update their technology and so methods and strategies are continually evolving.
psiphon-guide-para-6.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. A description of circumvention tools. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-section-1-sub-heading-psip.description: Sub-heading of Section 1 for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-7.message: As a censorship circumvention tool, the Psiphon app's primary objective is to establish a connection to the internet. The Psiphon app attempts to connect to known Psiphon servers using various methods. Sometimes the Psiphon traffic is obfuscated, meaning that it is disguised to look like a different or less identifiable type of traffic.
psiphon-guide-para-7.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-8.message: Because it is encrypted, censors are unable to see the content of traffic passing through the tunnel. Censors may still attempt to block encrypted traffic based on other characteristics, such as communication protocols. Communication protocols are a set of rules used to route data and ensure it arrives at the intended location.
psiphon-guide-para-8.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'It' refers to Psiphon traffic. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-traffic-diagram-image-alt.description: diagram image for the Psiphon Guide page

psiphon-guide-para-9.message: The Psiphon app has the ability to relay traffic through various communication protocols. It attempts to connect through different protocols until a connection is made. That way, if a censor is blocking one communication protocol, Psiphon is still able to connect by using another protocol.
psiphon-guide-para-9.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-10.message: To ensure that Psiphon's traffic is not identifiable, it is important to make it appear as generic and normal as possible to an external observer. The Psiphon app has the flexibility to adapt dynamically to changing network conditions by trying multiple strategies to connect, even when certain types of content or traffic are being filtered.
psiphon-guide-para-10.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. A general description of how Psiphon adapts to various network conditions. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-section-1-sub-heading-psip.description: Sub-heading of Section 1 for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-11.message: Psiphon operates a large network of servers. Each Psiphon app needs to know some information about the servers it's trying to reach in order to make a connection. Newly downloaded Psiphon apps contain a short list of known servers within the network that it attempts to connect to. Censors may routinely try to block some Psiphon servers, therefore many need to be available.
psiphon-guide-para-11.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-12.message: The network is always changing. Psiphon continuously deploys new servers across numerous locations worldwide. The Psiphon app will receive updated information about how to access them. Over time, a single Psiphon app may eventually gain knowledge of hundreds of new Psiphon servers.
psiphon-guide-para-12.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-section-1-sub-heading-psip.message: What makes Psiphon different than a VPN?
psiphon-guide-section-1-sub-heading-psip.description: Sub-heading of Section 1 for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-13.message: Virtual private networks (VPNs) are designed to allow users to send and receive data through a secure network tunnel. VPNs may even make use of very strong encryption, however, the majority of VPNs are not designed for circumvention purposes. VPNs are created for normal network conditions. VPN tools don't do anything special to disguise the nature of their traffic and communicate through one type of protocol. VPN traffic can be identified, so censors are able to block VPN traffic. Several countries are known to filter or degrade VPN connections, and others have been observed blocking VPNs in response to events such as elections or political protests. Today, modern censorship technology has made this kind of blocking relatively simple for censors.
psiphon-guide-para-13.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-14.message: Psiphon allows users to send and receive data through a secure network while also disguising the type of traffic being transmitted and even where it is coming from. Psiphon technology is designed to be resilient to censorship, including attempts to interfere with Psiphon network traffic directly. The numerous secure protocols used by Psiphon apps all appear different to censors, making it difficult to differentiate between Psiphon traffic and other types of internet use. Even if one traffic type is filtered on a network, Psiphon is able to connect through another protocol. Psiphon works where many other tools do not.
psiphon-guide-para-14.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-section-1-sub-heading-psip.message: How do I know I can trust Psiphon?
psiphon-guide-section-1-sub-heading-psip.description: Sub-heading of Section 1 for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-15.message: Psiphon is an open source application which means that its source code is available for anyone to review and comment on how the system is implemented and the underlying cryptographic technologies. Psiphon not only performs internal code reviews, but also has regular code audits and penetration tests performed by various external firms.
psiphon-guide-para-15.description: Section 1 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-16.message: Psiphon technology is made available through multiple propagation strategies. If one method is blocked or unavailable in your country, there are other techniques you can use to obtain the app.
psiphon-guide-para-16.description: Section 2 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-17.message: Psiphon is available on Android, iOS, Macs with Apple Silcon, and Windows, at our download page.
psiphon-guide-para-17.description: Section 2 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-18.message: Android and Windows versions of Psiphon are also available through an email responder.
psiphon-guide-para-18.description: Section 2 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-19.description: Section 2 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-20.message: Android: Search for “Psiphon” in the Google Play store. Depending on your region, you may have the option of downloading Psiphon Pro, with an option to purchase a subscription. This upgrade allows you to increase speed and remove ads.
psiphon-guide-para-20.description: Section 2 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-21.message: Android Email Responder Installation: An email from noreply@psiphon3.com will arrive in your inbox momentarily. Check your spam folder if you don't see it in your inbox. Check your spam folder if you don't see it in your inbox. Visit the download link or download the file 'PsiphonAndroid.ap_' attached to the email and rename it to have a “.apk” file extension, if necessary. Download Psiphon. Find the Psiphon icon on your phone and click on it to open. If you are unable to recieve the application directly through the email responder, try using a different email provider at the recieving address.
psiphon-guide-para-21.description: Section 2 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-22.message: Windows Email Responder Installation: An email from noreply@psiphon3.com will arrive in your inbox momentarily. Check your spam folder if you don't see it in your inbox. Download the file 'psiphon3' attached to the email and rename it to have a “.exe” file extension. If you are unable to recieve the application directly through the email responder, try using a different email provider at the recieving address.
psiphon-guide-para-22.description: Section 2 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-23.message: iOS: Search for “Psiphon” in the App Store. Installation: Search for Psiphon in the App Store and click 'Get' to download and install. You may be asked to re-enter your Apple ID and password. Find the Psiphon icon on your phone and click on it to open.
psiphon-guide-para-23.description: Section 2 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-24.message: Having trust in an internet tool or service begins with trust in the company that provides it. There are several important indicators to help gauge trustworthiness of tools and services. This document outlines Psiphon's source code, sustainability model, and external audits.
psiphon-guide-para-24.description: Section 3 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-25.message: Psiphon is an open source project. Open source means that the source code is shared publicly and anyone is able to review and make suggestions. By allowing interested parties access to inspect the source code, open source applications can increase confidence in how applications are designed.
psiphon-guide-para-25.description: Section 3 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-26.message: Find the source code and design documents here.

psiphon-guide-section-3-sub-heading-sust.description: Sub-heading of Section 3 for the Psiphon Guide page. The title refers to how Psiphon is able to sustain our network.

psiphon-guide-para-27.message: Psiphon has always been free to users. It is our mission to reach as many people as possible, which in part means eliminating economic barriers.
psiphon-guide-para-27.description: Section 3 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-28.message: Psiphon is committed to protecting our user data. So how does the company maintain a worldwide network?
psiphon-guide-para-28.description: Section 3 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-29.message: Psiphon is able to sustain operational costs by maintaining a diversity of income sources including:
psiphon-guide-para-29.description: Section 3 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-section-3-list-item-1.message: Winning international grants for technology development and network maintenance.
psiphon-guide-section-3-list-item-1.description: Section 3 list item for the Psiphon Guide page. Each list item in this section refers to Psiphon's actions relating to funding sources and revenue models.

psiphon-guide-section-3-list-item-2.message: Working with media partners to distribute content using branded Psiphon clients.
psiphon-guide-section-3-list-item-2.description: Section 3 list item for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-section-3-list-item-3.message: Collaborating with ad networks in certain regions.
psiphon-guide-section-3-list-item-3.description: Section 3 list item for the Psiphon Guide page.

psiphon-guide-section-3-list-item-4.message: Offering subscriptions for premium service in certain regions.
psiphon-guide-section-3-list-item-4.description: Section 3 list item for the Psiphon Guide page.

psiphon-guide-para-30.message: A software audit is the internal or external review of a software program to check its quality, progress, standards, and security. Internal code audits are performed regularly, and external code audits are generally triggered by major code changes such as the development of new features. External security audits are rigorous assessments conducted by third-party vendors to identify and record vulnerabilities and external threats in the source code. Audits help ensure the security of Psiphon users.
psiphon-guide-para-30.description: Section 3 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. A description of what software audits are. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-para-31.message: During an external code audit, Psiphon will work closely with the vendor. Any issues found are addressed based on importance, and then retested by the vendor. It is Psiphon's policy to make code reviews public. Find Psiphon's blog posts about these assessment events and the corresponding reports below.
psiphon-guide-para-31.description: Section 3 paragraph for the Psiphon Guide page. 'Psiphon' must not be translated or transliterated.

psiphon-guide-section-3-sub-heading-secu.description: Section 3 subheading for the Psiphon Guide page.
